type: Superalgos Review - Superalgos is a handy trading bot, really visual and simple to use thanks to a graphic interfqce. The bot is so light it can run on a raspberry with all the cost of ownership advantages it implies !

definition.text: Write a summary for this review page.

paragraphs.text: Left click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode. Then you can use docs.save to save your changes and app.contribute to send it to the main repository.
